summary: Gym Leader Blake would like to battle! @werewolfblake The key to good gift art is secretly asking your friends their favorite...
caption:
Gym Leader Blake would like to battle! @werewolfblake

The key to good gift art is secretly asking your friends their favorite pokemon on Anon. I was trying my best to imitate the Pokemon style and was working on getting the little details JUST right. Sorry I couldn’t do your tattoos there’s just way too many LMAO. I also used the same Sailor Jupiter pose I used when I drew you as a gem like 2 years ago

blog.name: mossdeepmedium
blog.title: A Blog By An Ex- Gym Leader
blog.description:
My name is Circe and I am the ex leader of the Mossdeep Gym in the Hoenn region, and the aunt of the current Mossdeep gym leaders, Liza and Tate.

I currently work at the Pokémon center with nurse Joy helping rehabilitate sick and injured Pokémon. Any questions you have I am more than willing to answer to the best of my ability

summary: Pokemon Card of the Day #1501: Revive (Black & White)
title: Pokemon Card of the Day #1501: Revive (Black & White)
body:
Revive was another return of a very old card with a change. This version of Revive had you simply put a Basic Pokemon from your discard pile onto your Bench. This was a big upgrade since the original made you put damage counters equal to half of that Pokemon’s HP onto the Pokemon you revived. This upgrade made Revive a surprisingly nice choice at a time where Basic Pokemon were amazing, and you’d see one tossed into decks from time to time. It was hard to find room for it over more specialized options to make a deck run, of course, but it wasn’t going to let you down.

A special note goes to Durant decks here, which relied on having 4 Durant on the field to work well. Since Durant had very low HP, Revive was vital to keep chipping away at the opponent’s deck. 4 Revive was almost required there. Most other decks used just 1 if they used it at all.

It was hard to find room for it over more specialized options to make a deck run, of course, but it wasn’t going to let you down.
